fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EUROPEAN TRANSPORT LAW; PORT MANAGEMENT & MARITIME LAW; INTERNATIONAL TRADE LAW; DRY BULK SHIPPING; CUSTOMS LAW; FOREIGN POLICY AND SECURITY; PROTECTION FOR THE ENVIRONMENT; REGULATION (EC) 561/2006
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Il Venice Maritime Cluster è un’associazione apartitica, autonoma e indipendente, senza scopo di lucro, a cui aderiscono associazioni e imprese e che persegue, sulla scorta della recente riforma delle Autorità di Sistema Portuale introdotta dal D.Lgs. 196/2016, le finalità di rappresentare le imprese e le associazioni di categoria operanti a vario titolo nel settore dell’economia marittima e portuale di Venezia. 
. 
The Venice Maritime Cluster is an autonomous and independent, non-profit, association of companies and companies, which, following the recent reform of the Port System Authorities introduced by D.Lgs.196/2016, aims to represent companies and trade associations operating in various fields in the marine and port economy of Venice
